definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pierce (NH id.; SI:1.1.4 [[הנקבה]] the piercing, boring through; Aram. [[נְקַב]], nqab id; [[נֶקְכָּא]] hole, etc.; Sinait. n.pr.m. [[נקבו]] Eut: 441:2, [[נקיבו]] Eut:99,2; 153, 2 (Lzb:325. 326 Cook:33); As. naḳbu, depth, spring of water; Ar. naqaba perforate, pierce, scrutinize, etc.,naqiybah;un sagacity, etc.; naqiybun leader, chief (one who scrutinizes));—

pierce, bore c. acc. 2Ki 18:21 = Is 36:6, Hb Hab 3:14 (all in fig.), Job 40:24, Job 41:2; c. acc. cogn. + [[ב]], [[וַיִּקּׂב חׂר בְּרַלְתּוֹ]] 2Ki 12:10 and he bored a hole in its lid; [[חְרוֹר נׇקוּב]] Hag 1:8 a bag pierced, i.e. with a hole in it.
prick off, designate, wages Ge 30:28 (J), name Is 62:2 (´[[י]] subj.; cf.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. in phr. [[נִקְּבוּ בְשֵׁמוֹת]] ([[אֲשֶׁר]]) who were pricked off, designated, by name Nu 1:17, 1Ch 12:32 (v:1Ch 12:31 van d. H), 1Ch 16:41, 2Ch 28:3, 2Ch 31:19, cf. Ezr 8:20.
